info.name: Odysee User Feedback Theme
info.description:
This is a new theme for the new Odysee theme, based on user feedback.
It's a work in progress.

NEW In v1.5:

* Fix font issue with a recent Odysee update that stopped this theme from rendering its font choice. 
* Improved colours and spacing.
* Markdown code view improvements.

Why Use This Theme?

* This version improves the posts, making them easier to read.
* A nicer comment area.
* Themed scrollbars. 
* Nicer, not so harsh, error messages (nags).
* Most of the grey has been removed and replaced with a theme compatible shade of purple.
* Notifications are more pleasant and have better alignment.
* Fire is now Odysee crimson, instead of red/orange.
* The crimson borders on thumbs are now a shade of purple.
* The white text is now less bright, with a slight theme undertone.
* The focus borders is now less drastic and kinder on the eyes.
* Various other small improvements.

Note: It only works on the dark theme atm.

More improvements coming soon.
